title: Salesforce MTS | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 2
Years of Experience: 3
Previous Comp : 38Lakhs
Prior Experience: Startup
Date of the Offer: August 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: MTS
Location:  Bangalore
Base Salary: 34Lakhs
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $15K per year
Bonus: 10% Performance bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~50Lakhs
Benefits: Standard Salesforce Benefits

title: Amazon | SDE3 | L6 | Hyderabad
content:
**Education**: Bachelors and Masters in Tier-1 colleges, India
**Years of Experience**: 9
Prior Experience: MNCs and Indian Unicorns
Date of the Offer: Q3 2024
**Company**: Amazon
**Title/Level**: SDE3 or L6 or Senior Software Dev Engineer
Location: Hyderabad
**Base Salary**: 90 LPA INR
**Relocation**: 2 Lacs INR
**Signing Bonus**: 35 Lacs first year, 28 Lacs second year
**Stock bonus**: $103K stock grant vested over 4 years (5%, 15%, 40%, 40%)
**Total comp** (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 125 - 130 LPA ~= 1.25 CPA INR 
Benefits: 39 Leaves a year
Other details: No need for negotiation. Sent this expectation over the email, and the HR offered whatever I requested. 
Interview Result : Got inclined decision in all 6 technical rounds.
**Offer Result** : Accepted

**Enquiry** : Is this salary an average salary for Amazon sde3 new hire ? How much is the work pressure at SDE3 ? How often SDE3 is pipped ?
role: Sde3 Or L6 Or Senior Software Dev Engineer
